document.full_text: four prominent rock acts filed a class-action suit against universal music group on thursday, accusing the record company of owing what may amount to millions of dollars in unpaid earnings.
document.title: suit seeks higher royalties from universal music
lines_and_colors: four prominent rock acts filed a class-action suit against universal music group on thursday, accusing the record company of owing what may amount to millions of dollars in unpaid earnings.
